pages.text: Summoning $(bred)Noble Zombie$() requires a $(l)multi-block structure$(). You need $(l)three obsidians connected straight together, and then place two withered roses $() on each side, as shown in the picture on the right.

After the set up, the $(bred)coffin team$() will appear first, defeat them then the $(bred)noble zombie$() locked in the coffin will appear. When the noble zombie surrounded by $(bpurple)purple particles$(), that is the signal that he is about to teleport, please $(baqua)freeze$() it in time. The noble zombie will also $(bred)hypnotize plants$() and summon mourner zombies, which will generate $(bred)tombstones$() when they die.
